channel.title: CVE Feed for The PostgreSQL Global Development Group -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for The PostgreSQL Global Development Group -- all products

item.title: CVE-2018-1052|2024-09-16T17:08:06.088Z -- the%20postgresql%20global%20development%20group -- postgresql
item.description: Memory disclosure vulnerability in table partitioning was found in postgresql 10.x before 10.2, allowing an authenticated attacker to read arbitrary bytes of server memory via purpose-crafted insert to a partitioned table.
